article.title: Bareihs Assigned to Headquarters U.S. Air Forces in Europe, U.S. Air Forces Africa

tags.tag: Headquarters U.S. Air Forces in Europe

article.text: Brig. Gen. Dieter E. Bareihs, USAF, has been assigned as director, plans, programs, and analyses, Headquarters U.S. Air Forces in Europe and U.S. Air Forces Africa, Ramstein Air Base, Germany.
